description.part2: I consider myself a versatile person with strong analytical skills to carry out tasks and excellent communication abilities. I am prepared to contribute my knowledge and skills, actively participating in the continuous improvement of processes, projects, and teams. I seek an environment where I can grow both personally and professionally, helping to efficiently and effectively achieve work goals. I have experience in e-commerce and custom platforms.
description.strong2: Specialized in React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Firebase, with a focus on clean and scalable code.
description.part3: I work well in a team to create efficient and optimized solutions, prioritizing the user experience. I constantly train myself to improve, learn, and add value to every project.
